results.title: Effect of atenolol on QTc interval lengthening during hypoglycaemia in type 1 diabetes.
results.text_hl: Effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_610141</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:610141 @@@QTc interval lengthening@@@ during hypoglycaemia in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1 @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@type 1 diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Lee SP, Harris ND, Robinson RT, Davies C, Ireland R, Macdonald IA, Heller SR. Effect of atenolol on QTc interval lengthening during hypoglycaemia in type 1 diabetes. Diabetologia. 2005 Jul;48(7):1269-72. PMID: 15915336

results.title: The influence of atenolol and propafenone on QT interval dispersion in patients 3 months after myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: The influence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Propafenone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011405 @@@propafenone@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_610141</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:610141 @@@QT interval dispersion@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ 3 months after @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@.

citations.NLM: Puljevic D, Smalcelj A, Durakovic Z, Goldner V. The influence of atenolol and propafenone on QT interval dispersion in patients 3 months after myocardial infarction. Int J Clin Pharmacol Ther. 1997 Sep;35(9):381-4. PMID: 9314091

results.title: A comparison of the long-term effects of sotalol and atenolol on QT interval and arrhythmias after myocardial infarction.
results.text_hl: A comparison of the long-term effects of @CHEMICAL_Sotalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013015 @@@sotalol@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ on QT @<m>DISEASE_610141</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:610141 @@@interval@@@ and @DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmias@@@ after @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@myocardial infarction@@@.
